title: Investors buying the dip ‘better buckle up their seat belts’ - Yahoo Finance
content: Investors buying the dip ‘better buckle up their seat belts’  Yahoo Finance
description: After a dismal start to the year for equities, and amid a backdrop of a capricious Federal Reserve gearing up to tighten monetary conditions and raise interest rates, dip-buyers anticipating consistent rebounds to all-time highs may have to temper their expectations.
